Class Piece

java.lang.Object
abcpackage.Piece
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook
public abstract class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
Piece class where it specifies the piece object and its functions
Author:
Daniel Rogozenski
